oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Photo Memories Say 'Hallelujah!' to Library Staff"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; African Americans; newspapers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News article from the Commercial Appeal. Rubye Woodruff Carter donated her mother's papers to the Memphis and Shelby County Room. 2 pages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: newspaper clipping, page 1: 8.5 x 11, page 2: 14 x 8.5
